metadata.title: CVE-2019-14275 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - negligible
metadata.description:
Xfig fig2dev 3.2.7a has a stack-based buffer overflow in the calc_arrowfunction in bound.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-14275` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

fig2dev - 1:3.2.6a-6ubuntu1.1
transfig - 1:3.2.6a-6ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: fig2dev package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:3.2.6a-6ubuntu1.1').
